problem_statement:
### Problem We introduced the IOUPreview for bill splits https://github.com/Expensify/Expensify/issues/270707. But we are only showing one avatar in the IOUPreview when a bill split is created. Instead, we should show up to 4, or 3 if more than 4 participants are included in the split. **Current** **Desired** In addition, we should make sure the same order is used when the split is created while offline. (So when returning online, the order shouldn't change) ### Solution Yes please.
